com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock

Class ReentrantOperationLock<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock.AbstractOperationLock<C>
      • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock.ReentrantOperationLock<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOperationLock<C>

    public class ReentrantOperationLock<C>
extends AbstractOperationLock<C>
    Represents a reentrant lock that can be acquired and released in a balanced fashion multiple times by the same context.
    See Also:
    IOperationLock

      Creates a new reentrant lock instance.
